sentence.Network_en: This visage no mere veneer of vanity , is a vestige of vox populi now vacant vanished.
sentence.Network_cn: 这面孔不单是虚无的外表, 它还是业已不再的人民呼声的残响.

sentence.Network_en: This visage, no mere veneer of vanity a vestige of the vox populi now vacant, vanished.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个面貌, 只是为了粉饰虚荣残余痕迹,不得不带上它,不得不昼伏夜出, 不见天日.
